soapUIScripts
[Groovy] Class utility

java.lang.Object
  utility

class utility

description:
Handles all the interaction with SoapUI and other helper functions that are used regularly in SoapUI.
Authors:
Diganth Aswath

Method Detail

closeDB

void closeDB(groovy.sql.Sql sqlInstance)
Closes connection to the DB opened via connectToDB().
Parameters:
sqlInstance - SQLInstance Object obtained as a return value from connectToDB().

connectToDB

java.lang.Object connectToDB(java.lang.String dbServerName, java.lang.String dbName)
Establishes a JDBC connection to a database.
Returns:
SQLInstance Object of the connection to the database that can be used in other functions when querying the db.
Parameters:
dbServerName - HostName of the database server to connect with.
dbName - Name of the database to connect with.

contextExpand

java.lang.Object contextExpand(java.lang.String values)
Get data values via XPath
Returns:
Xpath value as a string.
Parameters:
Xpath - like \${GetAccountInfo#Response#//*:CustomerID[1]}.

convertToDouble

java.lang.Double convertToDouble(java.lang.String text, java.lang.Object format)
Converts String to a Double with a desired format.
Returns:
Double value of the text in desired format.
Parameters:
text - Value that needs to be converted to a double as a string.
format - The format of double. Possible formats - "0.00", "0.000" etc.

countXMLNode

java.lang.Object countXMLNode(java.lang.Object data, java.lang.String nodeTag)
Quick way to find the count of a node in an XML. Used to figure out number of AddOn Nodes in a request or response.
Returns:
Count of the desired node as a string.
Parameters:
data - Soap request or response as a string.
nodeTag - The element name for whom we are requesting a count of.

dsProperty

java.lang.Object dsProperty(java.lang.Object sourceName, java.lang.Object info)
Retrieve Count of a datasource grid or data from a datasink subreport in current context.
Returns:
Count of Datasource or Data from DataSink is returned as a string.
Parameters:
sourceName - Name of the DataSource or DataSink as a string.
info - There are 2 possible values for this -
  • count - This indicates that a count of the datasource/datasink is requested.
  • info - This indicates that all the data from the datasink is requested.

executeDBQuery

java.lang.Object executeDBQuery(groovy.sql.Sql sqlInstance, java.lang.String SQLQuery)
Executes a Select DB query
Returns:
Result(s) of the Query as a String Array.
Parameters:
sqlInstance - SQLInstance Object obtained as a return value from connectToDB().
SQLQuery - The Query that needs to be executed against the database as a string.

getRawRequest

java.lang.Object getRawRequest(java.lang.Object testStep)
Get Soap request for a specific SoapUI test step in current context
Returns:
Soap request as a string.
Parameters:
TestStepName - of the Soap request.

insertDBQuery

java.lang.Object insertDBQuery(groovy.sql.Sql sqlInstance, java.lang.String SQLQuery)
Executes an Insert DB query
Returns:
"[Success]" if insert query was successful else "[NULL]".
Parameters:
sqlInstance - SQLInstance Object obtained as a return value from connectToDB().
SQLQuery - The Query that needs to be executed against the database as a string.

isAvailableInDataSource

java.lang.Boolean isAvailableInDataSource(java.lang.Object dataSourceName, java.lang.Object property)
Checks if a specific column is present in a datasource grid.
Returns:
Boolean value if property exists in datasource.
Parameters:
dataSourceName - Name of the DataSource as a string.
property - Name of the column whose presence is to be determined.

isFaultString

java.lang.Boolean isFaultString(java.lang.String soapData)
Check Response to check if contains faultString
Returns:
Boolean value if soapData is a faultstring or not.
Parameters:
soapData - Soap response as a string.

isSASUser

java.lang.Boolean isSASUser(java.lang.String authenticator)
Checks Authenticator to determine if 'SAS' user.
Returns:
Boolean value if it's a SAS user ot not.
Parameters:
authenticator - Authenticator from Soap response.

project

java.lang.Object project()
Get SoapUI Project in current context.
Returns:
SoapUI Project object.

readProjectProperty

java.lang.Object readProjectProperty(java.lang.Object property)
Get Property Value from a SoapUI Project in current context.
Returns:
Value of the property as a string.
Parameters:
property - Property Name as a string.

readProperty

java.lang.Object readProperty(java.lang.Object property)
Get Property value from a SoapUI Property TestStep in current testCase context. This is used when there is only one Property TestStep in the test case.
Returns:
Value of the property as a string.
Parameters:
property - Property Name as a string.

readTestCaseProperty

java.lang.Object readTestCaseProperty(java.lang.Object property)
Get Property Value from a SoapUI TestCase in current context.
Returns:
Value of the property as a string.
Parameters:
property - Property Name as a string.

readTestStepProperty

java.lang.Object readTestStepProperty(java.lang.Object testStepName, java.lang.Object property)
Get Property value from a SoapUI Property TestStep in current testCase context. This is used when there are multiple Property TestSteps in the test case.
Returns:
Value of the property as a string.
Parameters:
testStepName - Name of the Property TestStep as a string.
property - Property Name as a string.

readTestSuiteProperty

java.lang.Object readTestSuiteProperty(java.lang.Object property)
Get Property Value from a SoapUI TestSuite in current context.
Returns:
Value of the property as a string.
Parameters:
property - Property Name as a string.

readXMLNodeValue

java.lang.Object readXMLNodeValue(java.lang.Object data, java.lang.Object nodeTag)
Quick way to access elements of an XML. Mostly used to read Soap Requests and Responses to get values of various elements.
Returns:
Node value of the desired node as a string.
Parameters:
data - Soap request or response as a string.
nodeTag - The element in the XML whose data is required.

testCase

java.lang.Object testCase()
Get SoapUI TestCase in current context.
Returns:
SoapUI TestCase Object.

testStep

java.lang.Object testStep(java.lang.String testStepName)
Get TestStepName in SoapUI TestCase.
Returns:
SoapUI TestStep Object.
Parameters:
testStepName - Name of the testcase.

testStepsList

java.lang.Object testStepsList()
Get a list of all SoapUI TestSteps in current context.
Returns:
Object List of SoapUI TestSteps.

testSuite

java.lang.Object testSuite()
Get SoapUI TestSuite in current context.
Returns:
SoapUI TestSuite Object.

updateDBQuery

java.lang.Object updateDBQuery(groovy.sql.Sql sqlInstance, java.lang.String SQLQuery)
Executes an Update DB query
Returns:
"[Success]" if update query was successful else "[NULL]".
Parameters:
sqlInstance - SQLInstance Object obtained as a return value from connectToDB().
SQLQuery - The Query that needs to be executed against the database as a string.

Parameters:
property - Property Name as a string.
value - Property Value as a string.

writeProperty

java.lang.Object writeProperty(java.lang.Object property, java.lang.Object value)
Write Value to a Property in a SoapUI Property TestStep in current testCase context. This is used when there is only one Property Teststep in the test case.
Parameters:
property - Property Name as a string
value - Property Value as a string

value - Property Value as a string.

writeTestStepProperty

java.lang.Object writeTestStepProperty(java.lang.Object testStepName, java.lang.Object property, java.lang.Object value)

Parameters:
testStepName - Name of the Property TestStep as a string.
property - Property Name as a string.
value - Property Value as a string.
